0001.short_description: Changing your PNID country may cause unexpected results.
0001.long_description:
The Wii U and 3DS family of systems relies on this data to determine the correct region for your account.

Changing this setting may cause unexpected results.
0001.short_solution: Re-linking your PNID by deleting and re-adding the account will prevent this issue from occurring.
0001.long_solution:
### On the Wii U
1. Navigate to the User Settings Menu on the Wii U Gamepad
2. Scroll down to "Delete This User"
3. Enter you PNID password
4. Select "Next", and accept the warning prompt
> Note: Save Data will be lost when removing this user account. Make sure to back up your data with a tool like SaveMii before deleting the account. Once deleted, save data cannot be recovered
5. Select Next to proceed
6. Select "Delete" on the prompt
7. Create a new user account and log back into your PNID https://pretendo.network/docs/install/wiiu#pnid-setup
